name: Hill Valley Transit Bus Stop
description: A sleek, automated bus stop, where public transportation is a smooth, if slightly impersonal, experience. A holographic display shows the current location of all buses in the city, their arrival times calculated down to the second. A robotic arm extends to collect your fare, its metallic fingers surprisingly gentle. The air is thick with the scent of ozone and the faint, almost imperceptible, hum of the anti-gravity buses as they glide silently to a stop. It's a place where you can get anywhere in the city in minutes, but you might leave with the unsettling feeling that you're just another cog in a perfectly efficient, and soulless, machine.
